name: Quran By Subject
short_description:
A simple Web based php/MySQL system to display Quranic verses by subject matter. This is different from search because the categories are created by hand and include verses that complete the meaning of the subject and that do not include the keywords you would usually search for. The system is made in such a way that sites can exchange the categories between them easily.
We encourage you to participate by adding code and categories. The more we share the more we all get Hasanat.
Jazakom Allah Khayran
May God bless you all.
summary: A simple web system to display/share Quranic verses by subject matter
